english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_DESC:
Welcome to Bangkok, 47.

At the Thermal Bath Hotel in Bangkok, a peace summit is being held. Attending are all the leaders of the world's great nations, and naturally, the renowned hotel is swarming with security so you'll have only a small part of your usual equipment. 

None of these notabilities are your target. The Austrian terrorist, who named himself 'Julian', is planning to blow up the hotel. If successful, it will change the world forever. 
 
 'Julian' is your target. We don't know how he looks so you'll have to get in touch with Jackie Carrington, your contact. She'll let you instructions on a note with your room keycard at the reception. You're registered as Tobias Reaper. Normally we would not care about the leaders, but preventing the attack will make us popular with many governments and could mean a new clientele for our business.

 Our customer has requested to secure the hotel so your objectives are clear : find Julian and defuse the bomb. 

We think the bomb will explode at 8 PM, so you only have 30 minutes to prevent the explosion.

Good luck 47.

 Mission created by Kercyx based on the original Hitman: Codename 47 game. Are you ready for a real challenge?
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_SPOTTED_DESC: Don't get spotted or Julian will start the bomb countdown.
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_SPOTTED_HUD: 47, you've been spotted! The bomb countdown has started. Hurry up and find the bomb detonator!
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_BOMB_DESC: Defuse the Bomb hidden in the hotel.
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_CONTACT_DESC: Don't kill or pacify The Contact.
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_CONTACT_HUD: Don't kill or pacify The Contact
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_KEYCARD_DESC: Go to the reception and check in as Tobias Reaper and await the next instructions to meet The Contact.
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_207KEYCARD_DESC: Go to the bar on the first floor, blend in as a client and meet The Contact to retrieve the target's room keycard. She'll call you her "next ex-husband".
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_JULIAN_HUD: Eliminate Julian in an electrocution accident
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_JULIAN_DESC: Jackie Carrington sedated the target in his room. Eliminate him. You must make it look like an electrocution or there will be suspicions on Jackie.
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_STALKER_DESC: 47, it seems someone is watching your contact. He was sitting next to you at the bar when you met her. Pacify and stash him in a container for extraction and interrogation.
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_MILITIA1_DESC: He's not alone... Eliminate all Militia Soldiers in the Medow Brown Lounge to clear the area.
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_MILITIA1_HUD: Eliminate all Militia Soldiers in the Medow Brown Lounge
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_MILITIA2_HUD: Eliminate all Militia Soldiers in the Delivery Area
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_DETONATOR_DESC: The stalker began to talk... A man disguised as a high ranking security guard in the basement has the detonator, retrieve it now!
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_PLANB_DESC: 47, Julian had a plan B: he unleashed a deadly virus in the kitchen! Two people are infected. Eliminate the two infected and hide them in the freezer. We'll extract their bodies later.
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_PLANB_HUD: Eliminate the infected and stash them in the freezer
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_ANTIVIRUS_HUD: Do a self-injection of Anti-Virus, now!
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_ERASE_DESC: Take the tapes from the Security System Recorder. We need them intact.
english.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_ERASE_HUD: Take the tapes from the Security System Recorder
english.UI_PEACOCK_LEEHONG_DESC:
Good evening 47. Our targets are Lee Hong, the leader of the Red Dragon Triad and Angus Pritchard, a rich antiquities collector but also a former FBI source. They are supposed to meet in a fish restaurant in a few minutes to exchange an ancient gold idol for informations about our client. The client wants you to retrieve these informations. Hong and Pritchard don't want to be seen together so they are eating at seperate tables but will make the exchange in about 10 minutes. This cannot happen 47. Our client also wants you to make believe the exchange went wrong between these two to avoid to be under suspicion. Be creative. I've heard the Triad uses special ammo for their rifles. Maybe you can use this information to increminate the Triad in Pritchard's murder...
The clock is ticking 47. Good Luck.
Made by a Peacock community member known as kercyx.
english.UI_PEACOCK_LEEHONG_TRANSACTION_DESC: Kill Lee Hong and Angus Pritchard to prevent the transaction
english.UI_PEACOCK_LEEHONG_DOCUMENTS_DESC: Retrieve the Secret Documents in Pritchard's hotel room.
english.UI_PEACOCK_LEEHONG_IDOL_DESC: Retrieve The Golden Idol from Lee Hong's body.
english.UI_PEACOCK_LEEHONG_ANGUS: Eliminate Angus Pritchard with The Gold Dragon Rifle
english.UI_PEACOCK_LEEHONG_DRIVER_DESC: Eliminate Lee Hong's driver Blue Lotus in an explosion.
english.UI_PEACOCK_LEEHONG_DRIVER_HUD: Eliminate the Blue Lotus in an explosion

italian.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_DESC:
Welcome to Bangkok, 47.

At the Thermal Bath Hotel in Bangkok, a peace summit is being held. Attending are all the leaders of the world's great nations, and naturally, the renowned hotel is swarming with security so you'll have only a small part of your usual equipment. 

None of these notabilities are your target. The Austrian terrorist, who named himself 'Julian', is planning to blow up the hotel. If successful, it will change the world forever. 
 
 'Julian' is your target. We don't know how he looks so you'll have to get in touch with Jackie Carrington, your contact. She'll let you instructions on a note with your room keycard at the reception. You're registered as Tobias Reaper. Normally we would not care about the leaders, but preventing the attack will make us popular with many governments and could mean a new clientele for our business.

 Our customer has requested to secure the hotel so your objectives are clear : find Julian and defuse the bomb. 

We think the bomb will explode at 8 PM, so you only have 30 minutes to prevent the explosion.

Good luck 47.

 Mission created by Kercyx based on the original Hitman: Codename 47 game. Are you ready for a real challenge?
italian.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_SPOTTED_DESC: Don't get spotted or Julian will start the bomb countdown.
italian.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_SPOTTED_HUD: 47, you've been spotted! The bomb countdown has started. Hurry up and find the bomb detonator!

italian.UI_PEACOCK_LEEHONG_DESC:
Good evening 47. Our targets are Lee Hong, the leader of the Red Dragon Triad and Angus Pritchard, a rich antiquities collector but also a former FBI source. They are supposed to meet in a fish restaurant in a few minutes to exchange an ancient gold idol for informations about our client. The client wants you to retrieve these informations. Hong and Pritchard don't want to be seen together so they are eating at seperate tables but will make the exchange in about 10 minutes. This cannot happen 47. Our client also wants you to make believe the exchange went wrong between these two to avoid to be under suspicion. Be creative. I've heard the Triad uses special ammo for their rifles. Maybe you can use this information to increminate the Triad in Pritchard's murder...
The clock is ticking 47. Good Luck.
Made by a Peacock community member known as kercyx.

german.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_DESC:
Willkommen in Bangkok, 47.

Am Thermal Bath Hotel in Bangkok findet ein Friedensgipfel statt. Teilnehmend sind alle Anführer der größten Weltnationen und natürlich ist das renomierte Hotel voll mit Sicherheitskräften, also wirst du nur einen kleinen Teil deiner Ausrüstung dabei haben.

Niemand dieser Persönlichkeiten ist dein Ziel. Der Österreichische Terrorist der sich selbst 'Julian' nennt, plant das Hotel in die Luft zu jagen. Sollte er Erfolg haben, wird das die Welt für immer verändern.
 
 'Julian' ist dein Ziel. Wir wissen nicht wie er aussieht, also wirst du mit Jackie Carrington kontakt aufnehmen müssen. Sie hat dir Anweisungen auf einer Notiz mit deiner Zimmerkarte an der Rezeption hinterlasen. Du bist angemeldet als Tobias Reaper. Normalerweise interessieren uns die Anführer nicht, aber wenn wir diesen Anschlag verhindern, macht uns das bei vielen Regierungen beliebt und könnte uns neue Kunden beschaffen.

Wir denken die Bombe wird um 20:00 Uhr explodieren, also hast du nur 30 Minuten zeit um das alles zu verhindern.

Viel Glück 47.

 Mission erstellt von Kercyx basierend auf dem originalen Hitman: Codename 47 Spiel. Bist du bereit für eine echte Herausforderung?

german.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_PLANB_DESC: 47, Julian hatte einen Plan B: Er hat einen tödlichen Virus in der Küche freigelassen! Zwei Leute sind infiziert. Eliminiere die zwei Infizierten und verstecke sie im Kühlschrank. Wir holen die Leichen später ab.

german.UI_PEACOCK_LEEHONG_DESC:
Guten Abend 47. Unser Ziel ist Lee Hong, der Anführer der Red Dragon Triade und Angus Pritchard, ein reicher Antiquitätensammler aber auch eine ehemalige FBI Quelle. Beide sollen sich in ein paar Minuten in einem Fischrestaurant Treffen um ein goldenes Idol für Informationen über unseren Klienten zu tauschen. Der Klient möchte das du diese Informationen besorgst. Hong und Pritchard möchten nicht zusammen gesehen werden also essen sie an getrennten Tischen, aber sie werden den Austausch in ungefähr 10 Minuten durchführen. Das darf nicht passieren, 47. Unser Klient möchte das sie im Glauben gelassen werden, das der Tausch zwischen den Beiden schiefging um keine Aufmerksamkeit zu erregen. Sei kreativ. Ich habe gehört die Triade benutzt spezielle Munition für ihre Gewehre. Vielleicht kannst du diese Informationen nutzen um die Triade mit Pritchards Mord zu beschuldigen...
Die Uhr tickt 47. Viel Glück.
Gemacht von einem Peacock Community Mitglied bekannt als kercyx.

spanish.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_DESC:
Welcome to Bangkok, 47.

At the Thermal Bath Hotel in Bangkok, a peace summit is being held. Attending are all the leaders of the world's great nations, and naturally, the renowned hotel is swarming with security so you'll have only a small part of your usual equipment. 

None of these notabilities are your target. The Austrian terrorist, who named himself 'Julian', is planning to blow up the hotel. If successful, it will change the world forever. 
 
 'Julian' is your target. We don't know how he looks so you'll have to get in touch with Jackie Carrington, your contact. She'll let you instructions on a note with your room keycard at the reception. You're registered as Tobias Reaper. Normally we would not care about the leaders, but preventing the attack will make us popular with many governments and could mean a new clientele for our business.

 Our customer has requested to secure the hotel so your objectives are clear : find Julian and defuse the bomb. 

We think the bomb will explode at 8 PM, so you only have 30 minutes to prevent the explosion.

Good luck 47.

 Mission created by Kercyx based on the original Hitman: Codename 47 game. Are you ready for a real challenge?
spanish.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_SPOTTED_DESC: Don't get spotted or Julian will start the bomb countdown.
spanish.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_SPOTTED_HUD: 47, you've been spotted! The bomb countdown has started. Hurry up and find the bomb detonator!
spanish.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_BOMB_DESC: Defuse the Bomb hidden in the hotel.
spanish.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_CONTACT_DESC: Don't kill or pacify The Contact.
spanish.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_CONTACT_HUD: Don't kill or pacify The Contact
spanish.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_KEYCARD_DESC: Go to the reception and check in as Tobias Reaper and await the next instructions to meet The Contact.
spanish.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_207KEYCARD_DESC: Go to the bar on the first floor, blend in as a client and meet The Contact to retrieve the target's room keycard. She'll call you her "next ex-husband".
spanish.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_JULIAN_HUD: Eliminate Julian in an electrocution accident
spanish.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_JULIAN_DESC: Jackie Carrington sedated the target in his room. Eliminate him. You must make it look like an electrocution or there will be suspicions on Jackie.
spanish.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_STALKER_DESC: 47, it seems someone is watching your contact. He was sitting next to you at the bar when you met her. Pacify and stash him in a container for extraction and interrogation.
spanish.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_MILITIA1_DESC: He's not alone... Eliminate all Militia Soldiers in the Medow Brown Lounge to clear the area.

spanish.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_PLANB_DESC: 47, Julian had a plan B: he unleashed a deadly virus in the kitchen! Two people are infected. Eliminate the two infected and hide them in the freezer. We'll extract their bodies later.

spanish.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_ERASE_HUD: Take the tapes from the Security System Recorder
spanish.UI_PEACOCK_LEEHONG_DESC:
Good evening 47. Our targets are Lee Hong, the leader of the Red Dragon Triad and Angus Pritchard, a rich antiquities collector but also a former FBI source. They are supposed to meet in a fish restaurant in a few minutes to exchange an ancient gold idol for informations about our client. The client wants you to retrieve these informations. Hong and Pritchard don't want to be seen together so they are eating at seperate tables but will make the exchange in about 10 minutes. This cannot happen 47. Our client also wants you to make believe the exchange went wrong between these two to avoid to be under suspicion. Be creative. I've heard the Triad uses special ammo for their rifles. Maybe you can use this information to increminate the Triad in Pritchard's murder...
The clock is ticking 47. Good Luck.
Made by a Peacock community member known as kercyx.

spanish.UI_PEACOCK_LEEHONG_DRIVER_DESC: Eliminate Lee Hong's driver Blue Lotus in an explosion.
spanish.UI_PEACOCK_LEEHONG_DRIVER_HUD: Eliminate the Blue Lotus in an explosion

russian.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_DESC:
Добро пожаловать в Бангкок, 47. 

В гостинице с сауной в Бангкоке пройдёт мирная конференция. На неё собираются главы всех великих наций. И, конечно же, гостиница будет очень хорошо охраняться, так что внутрь вам удастся пронести лишь небольшую часть оборудования. 

Ваша цель не принадлежит к кругу известных людей. Австрийский террорист 'Джулиан' планирует взорвать гостиницу. Если это удастся, мир изменится навсегда. 
 
 'Джулиан' — ваша цель. Мы не знаем, как он выглядит, так что вам придётся связаться с Джеки Керрингтон, нашим связным в гостинице. Она оставила инструкции на вашей ключ-карте в приемной гостиницы. Вы зарегистрированы под именем 'Тобиас Рипер'. В обычной ситуации мы не обращаем внимания на известных политиков, но если мы предотвратим взрыв, наше Агентство получит кредит доверия от правительств ведущих стран. А значит, у нас будут новые клиенты.

 Наш заказчик обезопасить гостиницу, так что ваши цели ясны: найти Джулиана и обезвредить бомбу. 

Наши аналитики считают, что бомба взорвётся в восемь вечера, что значит, что у вас будет лишь полчаса, чтобы обезведить бомбу.

Удачи, 47. 

 Миссия создана Kercyx и вдохновлена одноимённой миссией из игры 'Hitman: Codename 47'. Вы готовы к настоящему испытанию?

russian.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_KEYCARD_DESC: Направляйтесь к приёмной и зарегистрируйтесь под именем 'Тобиас Рипер'. Затем ожидайте дальнейших инструкций.
russian.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_207KEYCARD_DESC: Направляйтесь к бару на первом этаже, начните сливаться под видом посетителя и встретьтесь с вашим связным. Она предоставит вам ключ-карту от комнаты цели. Кодовая фраза связного: "будущий бывший муж".
russian.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_JULIAN_HUD: Устраните Джулиана, обставив всё как несчастный случай, связанный с электричеством
russian.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_JULIAN_DESC: Джеки Керрингтон добилась того, чтобы ваша цель уснула. Устраните его. Всё должно выглядеть как несчастный случай, связанный с электричеством, чтобы никто не подумал на Джеки.
russian.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_STALKER_DESC: 47, похоже, что кто-то следит за вашим связным. Он сидел рядом с вами, когда вы с ней встретились. Нейтрализуйте его и поместите в контейнер, дабы мы смогли устроить ему допрос.

russian.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_PLANB_DESC: 47, у Джулиана был план Б: Смертельный вирус на кухне! Два человека уже заражены! Устраните двух заражённых и поместите их в морозильную камеру. Их тела заберут позже.
russian.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_PLANB_HUD: Устраните заражённых и поместите их тела в морозильную камеру
russian.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_ERASE_DESC: Заберите записи с камер наблюдения. Они нужны нам в целости и сохранности.
russian.UI_PEACOCK_LEEHONG_DESC:
Добрый вечер, 47. Твои цели - Ли Хонг, лидер триады Красных Драконов и Агнус Притчард, богатый коллекционер антиквариата, ранее бывший источником ФБР. Через несколько минут они должны встретиться в рыбном ресторане, чтобы совершить обмен золотого идола на информацию о нашем клиенте. Клиент хочет, чтобы ты заполучил эту информацию. Хонг и Притчард не хотят, чтобы их видели вместе, так что, дабы не вызывать подозрений, они едят за разными столами. Обмен произойдет примерно через 10 минут. Ты должен им помешать, 47. Вдобавок, наш клиент хочет, чтобы ты обставил всё так, будто бы обмен сорвался. Таким образом, нашего клиента никто не будет подозревать. Импровизируй. Я слышала, что триады используют особые патроны для своих пушек. Быть может, это сыграет тебе на руку и позволит выставить триад убийцами Притчарда... 
Время на исходе, 47. Удачи.
 Сделано пользователем Peacock под ником kercyx.

chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_DESC:
欢迎来到曼谷，47。

位于曼谷的洗浴酒店，正在举行一次和平峰会。参加会议的都是世界上所有大国的领导人，自然，这家著名酒店里装备了大量安保，所以你只能拥有平时一小部分的装备。

这些知名人士都不是你的目标。这个自称“朱利安”的奥地利恐怖分子正计划炸毁这家酒店。如果成功，这将永远改变世界。
 
“朱利安”是你的目标。我们不知道他的长相，所以你必须与你的联系人杰茜·卡灵顿取得联系。她会在前台给你的房间钥匙卡上写下指示。你的登记化名为托拜厄斯·里佩尔。通常情况下，我们不会关心领导人的死生，但阻止袭击将使我们受到许多政府的欢迎，并可能意味着我们的业务拓展出新的客户群。

我们的客户要求保护酒店的安全，所以你们的目标很明确：找到朱利安并拆除炸弹。

我们分析认为炸弹会在晚上8点爆炸，所以你只有30分钟的时间来防止爆炸。

祝你好运，47。

任务由Kercyx根据《杀手：代号47》原始游戏制作。准备好迎接真正的挑战了吗？
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_SPOTTED_DESC: 别被发现，否则朱利安会启动炸弹计时器。
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_SPOTTED_HUD: 47，你已经被发现了！炸弹倒计时已经开始。快点找到引爆器！
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_BOMB_DESC: 拆除藏在酒店里的炸弹。
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_CONTACT_DESC: 不要杀死或制伏联络人。
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_CONTACT_HUD: 不要杀死或制伏联络人
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_KEYCARD_DESC: 前往接待处，以托拜厄斯·里佩尔的身份登记，并等待下一步指示，与联络人会面。
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_207KEYCARD_DESC: 前往一楼酒吧，以酒店客人的身份混入，与联络人见面并取回目标的房间钥匙卡。她会称你为她的“下一任前夫”。
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_JULIAN_HUD: 用电击事故消灭朱利安
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_JULIAN_DESC: 杰茜·卡灵顿在目标的房间里对其注射了镇静剂。消灭他。你必须将现场伪装成电击事故，否则杰茜会被怀疑。
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_STALKER_DESC: 47，似乎有人在监视你的联络人。你们在酒吧会面时，他就坐在你旁边。制伏并把他藏起来，以便提取和审讯。
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_MILITIA1_DESC: 他并未单独行动……消灭梅道·布朗休息室的所有民兵，以清除该区域。
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_MILITIA1_HUD: 消灭梅道·布朗休息室的所有民兵战士
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_MILITIA2_HUD: 消灭交货区的所有民兵战士
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_DETONATOR_DESC: 跟踪者说话了……地下室里一个伪装成高级保安的人拿着引爆器，马上取回它！
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_PLANB_DESC: 47，朱利安使用了B计划：他在厨房里释放了一种致命病毒！有两个人被感染了。消灭这两个感染者，把他们藏在冰柜里。我们稍后会处理他们的尸体。
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_PLANB_HUD: 消灭感染者，并将其藏在冰箱里
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_ANTIVIRUS_HUD: 自我注射病毒抗体，马上！
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_ERASE_DESC: 从安保监控设备上取得磁带。我们需要它们完好无损。
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_ERASE_HUD: 从安保监控设备上取得磁带
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_LEEHONG_DESC:
晚上好，47。

我们的目标是李洪，红龙三合会的领导人和安格斯·普里查德，一个富有的古董收藏家，但也是前联邦调查局的线人。他们应该在几分钟后在一家鱼馆见面，用一个古代金质神像换取我们客户的信息。客户希望你能取回这些信息。

洪和普里查德不想被看到在一起，所以他们不在同一张桌子上吃饭，但会在10分钟内进行交换。这不会发生的，47。

我们的客户同时还想让你伪造事实，把交易的失败归咎于这二人自身的问题，以避免怀疑。发挥你的创意吧。

我听说三合会给他们的步枪配备特殊弹药。也许你可以利用这些信息来增加三合会在普里查德谋杀案中的作用……

时间紧迫，47。祝你好运。

由名为kercyx的一位Peacock社区成员制作。
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_LEEHONG_TRANSACTION_DESC: 消灭李洪和安格斯·普里查德，以阻止交易进行。

chineseTraditional.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_DESC:
Welcome to Bangkok, 47.

At the Thermal Bath Hotel in Bangkok, a peace summit is being held. Attending are all the leaders of the world's great nations, and naturally, the renowned hotel is swarming with security so you'll have only a small part of your usual equipment. 

None of these notabilities are your target. The Austrian terrorist, who named himself 'Julian', is planning to blow up the hotel. If successful, it will change the world forever. 
 
 'Julian' is your target. We don't know how he looks so you'll have to get in touch with Jackie Carrington, your contact. She'll let you instructions on a note with your room keycard at the reception. You're registered as Tobias Reaper. Normally we would not care about the leaders, but preventing the attack will make us popular with many governments and could mean a new clientele for our business.

 Our customer has requested to secure the hotel so your objectives are clear : find Julian and defuse the bomb. 

We think the bomb will explode at 8 PM, so you only have 30 minutes to prevent the explosion.

Good luck 47.

 Mission created by Kercyx based on the original Hitman: Codename 47 game. Are you ready for a real challenge?

chineseTraditional.UI_PEACOCK_LEEHONG_DESC:
Good evening 47. Our targets are Lee Hong, the leader of the Red Dragon Triad and Angus Pritchard, a rich antiquities collector but also a former FBI source. They are supposed to meet in a fish restaurant in a few minutes to exchange an ancient gold idol for informations about our client. The client wants you to retrieve these informations. Hong and Pritchard don't want to be seen together so they are eating at seperate tables but will make the exchange in about 10 minutes. This cannot happen 47. Our client also wants you to make believe the exchange went wrong between these two to avoid to be under suspicion. Be creative. I've heard the Triad uses special ammo for their rifles. Maybe you can use this information to increminate the Triad in Pritchard's murder...
The clock is ticking 47. Good Luck.
Made by a Peacock community member known as kercyx.
chineseTraditional.UI_PEACOCK_LEEHONG_TRANSACTION_DESC: Kill Lee Hong and Angus Pritchard to prevent the transaction

japanese.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_DESC:
Welcome to Bangkok, 47.

At the Thermal Bath Hotel in Bangkok, a peace summit is being held. Attending are all the leaders of the world's great nations, and naturally, the renowned hotel is swarming with security so you'll have only a small part of your usual equipment. 

None of these notabilities are your target. The Austrian terrorist, who named himself 'Julian', is planning to blow up the hotel. If successful, it will change the world forever. 
 
 'Julian' is your target. We don't know how he looks so you'll have to get in touch with Jackie Carrington, your contact. She'll let you instructions on a note with your room keycard at the reception. You're registered as Tobias Reaper. Normally we would not care about the leaders, but preventing the attack will make us popular with many governments and could mean a new clientele for our business.

 Our customer has requested to secure the hotel so your objectives are clear : find Julian and defuse the bomb. 

We think the bomb will explode at 8 PM, so you only have 30 minutes to prevent the explosion.

Good luck 47.

 Mission created by Kercyx based on the original Hitman: Codename 47 game. Are you ready for a real challenge?

spanishMexican.UI_PEACOCK_LEEHONG_DESC:
Good evening 47. Our targets are Lee Hong, the leader of the Red Dragon Triad and Angus Pritchard, a rich antiquities collector but also a former FBI source. They are supposed to meet in a fish restaurant in a few minutes to exchange an ancient gold idol for informations about our client. The client wants you to retrieve these informations. Hong and Pritchard don't want to be seen together so they are eating at seperate tables but will make the exchange in about 10 minutes. This cannot happen 47. Our client also wants you to make believe the exchange went wrong between these two to avoid to be under suspicion. Be creative. I've heard the Triad uses special ammo for their rifles. Maybe you can use this information to increminate the Triad in Pritchard's murder...
The clock is ticking 47. Good Luck.
Made by a Peacock community member known as kercyx.

portugueseBrazil.UI_PEACOCK_TRADITIONS_DESC:
Welcome to Bangkok, 47.

At the Thermal Bath Hotel in Bangkok, a peace summit is being held. Attending are all the leaders of the world's great nations, and naturally, the renowned hotel is swarming with security so you'll have only a small part of your usual equipment. 

None of these notabilities are your target. The Austrian terrorist, who named himself 'Julian', is planning to blow up the hotel. If successful, it will change the world forever. 
 
 'Julian' is your target. We don't know how he looks so you'll have to get in touch with Jackie Carrington, your contact. She'll let you instructions on a note with your room keycard at the reception. You're registered as Tobias Reaper. Normally we would not care about the leaders, but preventing the attack will make us popular with many governments and could mean a new clientele for our business.

 Our customer has requested to secure the hotel so your objectives are clear : find Julian and defuse the bomb. 

We think the bomb will explode at 8 PM, so you only have 30 minutes to prevent the explosion.

Good luck 47.

 Mission created by Kercyx based on the original Hitman: Codename 47 game. Are you ready for a real challenge?
